title: e.l.f., SuperClarify Cleanser, Lightweight, Gentle, Effective, Soothing, Removes Makeup and Impurities, Prevents Clogged Pores, Strengthens , Infused with Lavender, 3.4 Fl Oz
features: Gel cleaner which lifts impurities from the skin, revealing a clean, smooth complexion..
Infused with Niacinamide (vitamin B3) and lavender to help maintain moisture content while toning and clarifying skin tone.
Apply a small amount of cleanser onto the face, gently massage in circular motions and rinse.
Good for all skin types and suitable for daily use along with SuperTone and the SuperMask for a soothing boost of hydration.
Cruelty-free, vegan and 100% free from Phthalates, Parabens, Nonylphenol, Ethoxylates, Triclosan, Triclocarban, and Hydroquinone.
description: The superclarify cleanser is your secret weapon to a flawless face. Niacinamide (Vitamin B3) helps maintain moisture content while toning and clarifying skin tone. Lavender helps sooth the skin, leaving you with an E.L.F.Ing amazing glow. E.L.F. Makes the best of Beauty accessible to every eye, lip, and face. Your originality is infinite, and we are inspired by what makes you unique. From the early explorer to the trend-obsessed beauty junkie-glam or bare faced, minimalist, maximalist and every look in between-we are for every eye, lip, and face. Proud to be 100% vegan and cruelty-free, worldwide.
